title: A Brave New Squad
description: The First book in the B-Squad series this is the story of a group of men and woman who are selected from their facebook profiles to form a new counter-terrorist unit known as the B-Squad. The story follows the squad on four missions. Once the missions are completed the members are free to go, but all is not as it seems. Non-stop action from the fist chapter takes the rsader on a journey through each mission until a revelation at the end that will drop your jaw!ebook versions are available at amazon and the paperback entitled 'B-Squad COURAGE' is available from I-Proclaimbookstore.com
author: Connor Fitzgerald
